name: Interrupted Gamplay
description:
Heya friend! Have you tried [POPULAR GAME] yet? W- W- Well, you should give it a go! With your f- f- fast reactions and skills, you can reach the t- t- top!*

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys | Move

LMB | Shoot

SHIFT/Space | Dodge

*[POPULAR GAME] requires a STABLE internet connection.
